page.title: 09CLUBS BLOOMFIELD CENTRE
page.content: THERE ARE MANY COMMUNITY GROUPS IN NARBERTH. THERE IS AN ACTION GROUP WHICH ORGANISES THINGS LIKE PANTOMIMES SUMMER FAYRES AND THE CARNIVAL.THE QUEENS HALL COMMITEE FIRST RAISED MONEY TO BUILD THE HALL AND NOW RUN THE HALL FOR THE BENIFIT OF THE TOWN.A VARIETY OF THINGS OCCUR IN THE QUEENS HALL FOR EXAMPLE PANTOMIMES,JUMBLE SALES ANTIQUE AUCTIONS,DISCOS AND LIVE POP GROUPS,(GIG).BLOOMFIELD ONCE WAS A COUNTRY HOUSE OWNED BY THE LEWIS LLOYD FAMILY. IT IS NOW A COMMUNITY CENTRE. A NUMBER OF GROUPS MEET AT BLOOMFIELD FOR ACTIVITIES SUCH AS TENNIS,SQUASH, PLAYGROUP,ART,CHOIR,BOXING,JUDO,WEAV- ING AND EMBROIDERY.THE CUBS, SCOUTS, BROWNIES AND GUIDES MEET IN THEIR HALL ON THE TOWN MOOR.
